remarks: Comparing two decimal integers (equal higher places).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Feb-2014.)
statement:
numlt.1 $e |- T e. NN $.
numlt.2 $e |- A e. NN0 $.
numlt.3 $e |- B e. NN0 $.
numlt.4 $e |- C e. NN $.
numlt.5 $e |- B < C $.
numlt $p |- ( ( T x. A ) + B ) < ( ( T x. A ) + C ) $.
